DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to compare the accuracy of Pleth Variability Index (Radical 7 device) and of Pulse Pressure Variation (Nexfin device) with the Doppler measurement of stroke volume (esophageal Doppler) to detect the response to a fluid challenge.
DOC.brief_title: Accuracy of Pulse Pressure Variation and of Pleth Variability Index to Predict the Response to a Fluid Challenge
